item.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
item.description: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”

item.title: My daughter has $500K in med-school expenses. Can my wife and I afford to pay it off?
item.description: “Our annual income is $140,000. We are both on Medicare.”

item.title: My grandmother disinherited my father, yet made him executor of her will. Now he refuses to file for probate.
item.description: “When my grandfather died, my father went into their home and took financial information and jewelry.”

item.title: United Airlines just tweaked its profit outlook for the year. It’s still not enough for the stock.
item.description: The revision comes amid ‘less geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainty,’ United says.
